text: is one of the 23 special wards in Tokyo, Japan.Tokyo Metropolitan Government (TMG), "Municipalities within Tokyo" . Retrieved 2012-3-27. The municipality calls itself "Itabashi City" in English.Itabashi City . Retrieved 2012-3-27. ==Geography== Itabashi is in northern Tokyo. It borders Toshima to the south. Nerima is on the ward's western border. The Arakawa River and Saitama Prefecture are the norther border. Kita is on the east. ==Related pages == * List of special wards of Tokyo * Capital of Japan ==References== ==Other websites== * Itabashi website ; * Tokyo Metropolitan Government, Special wards Category:Wards of Tokyo Category:Settlements in Tokyo Prefecture
title: Itabashi
